# kvlm-timeline-item

Displays a single timeline item eith its given title, timestamp and text.

## Example

```html
<kvlm-timeline-item
  date="2023-05-18"
  title="Foo"
  text="Bar"
></kvlm-timeline-item>
```

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type     |
|----------|-----------|----------|
| `date`   | `date`    | `Date`   |
| `text`   | `text`    | `string` |
| `title`  | `title`   | `string` |
